summary: just saw a post on instagram that basically said captain marvel is trash because it was made to make feminists happy. Like...
body: just saw a post on instagram that basically said captain marvel is trash because it was made to make feminists happy. Like sweetie I hate to break it to you but every piece of media ever created was made to make a certain group of people happy. Y’all just mad it ain’t you for once. get well soon

title: Coffee with Carol
body:
Prompt: “ Could you do a fic of Carol and reader going on a first date,,, maybe just a coffee date and so much fluff ;) thank you!”

First of all sorry honey for the long wait but here it is.

Carol Danvers x (fem)Reader

Words: 1050 oops

Warning: nothing aside from the ususal errors and I am not quite happy with the ending but I hope y’all like it. and a mention of a dumb dude at a bar

—————————————————————————————–

You nervously waited in front of the café, checking the name, address and time for the fifth time in 10 minutes to make sure you were at the right place. You were suppose to meet Carol here at 3, it was a quarter past now and you grew more anxious with each passing minute.

You met her a few nights ago at a bar, where she sang karaoke like a mad woman and rescued so from a shady dude who was trying to hit on you. Both of you immediately hit it of and spend the rest of the night together laughing and talking. At the end of it she took your phone, saved her number ( as Carol 😉 ) and asked if you wanted to meet up for a coffee.

You were like a solid 80% sure this was supposed to be a date but with someone as cool and beautiful as Carol you weren’t quite sure, since you know, you were just you.

You started bouncing your leg, the rather harsh wind biting at your skin. But you didn’t wanna go inside just yet, not without Carol, what if she stood you up, you would look like a fool, not that you would think Carol would let you down like that but still…. she was 15 minutes late… And with your wildly spiraling thoughts you didn’t even register the person suddenly standing in front of you.

“Hey gorgeous, waiting for someone?”, Carol asked with her signature smirk, using the same pick-up line the creep from a few nights ago tried using on you.
“Ohh uh ewww” you let out slightly startled and reminded of the weirdo from the bar.

“Ouch! Not happy to see me?” Carol teased. “Well I am, I was starting to think I would never see you again,” you said as Carol lead you inside the Café. She chuckled but stopped to grab your hand softly “ I am so sorry about that, there was an inconvenience at work but I came here as fast as I could” you took a good look at her.

She was wearing a brown leather jacket (ya know the one ;D), a white shirt and blue jeans, she looked so cute with her slightly tousled hair. It did look like she ran all the way to the Café.

“But I am gonna make it up to you. Pick whatever you want, my treat, drinks and cake, if you like.” She smiled brightly letting go of your hand to gently nudge you in the direction if the register, her hand now on your lower back.

“Hmm,    you are still not quite forgiven but it’s a good start” you teased, both of you falling into light banter, just like the night at the bar. “I’ll take a Café Latte and a piece of carrot cake, if that’s ok” you continued.

“Anything for a pretty girl like you” Carol bumped in you with her shoulder. A blush was making its way up your neck, “ how about I order and you look for a place to sit?” Carol smiled at you.

You nodded and turned around to find a compfy spot, you looked around the café, it was really cute. It had small bookshelves and soft relaxing music was playing in the background.
Your heart sped up as you remembered that you told Carol that you loved small coffee shops like this and it seemed like she remembered.

As you placed down your bag at a table for two near the window, your eyes trailed back to Carol, who was now waiting for your order to finish.
With all that witty banter you were now pretty sure this was a date. And you weren’t quite sure whether to be nervous or exited. However Carol seemed to make it so easy to talk to her.

Speaking of which, she placed your coffee and cake on the table. “Here you go” she said. Thanking her, you took a big sip of the coffee.
“Sooo, what have you been up to the last couple of days?” the blonde questioned. You covered most of the usual Smalltalk like work, family and all that jass, the night at the bar. So with that question the easy going conversation started.

Carol would stop to ask more, smirk and look you deep in the eyes whenever she had the chance. Your heart would beat like a drum every time she would give you a teasing nickname or laugh at your terrible (but honestly quite good) jokes.

By the end of the coffee and cake you two were nearly buzzing in your seats, exited at how good things were going.

———————————————-

“I had a wonderful time” you said as you stepped out of the café. “ So did I, and I would love to repeat that again sometime…soon” Carol said turning to you. “Well you have my number, all you gotta do is text” you shyly smiled at her.

Of course Carol smirked but you could also make out a faint blush on her cheeks. “Oh I sure will, gorgeous!” said the chocolate eyed woman as she gave you a quick peck on the cheek. You looked down with a chuckle, shaking your head. Trying to hide the massive blush appearing in your face.

“Stop saying that you remind me of that creepy man,” you mumbled.              “But why would I stop? It’s true and I kinda have to thank him for being so dumb, he gave me the perfect reason to talk to you.” Carol said, tilting her head slightly.


“Oh so you had me on your mind before you talked to me? I thought this was more of an accident,” you teased her.
“Oh… now that is not what I wanted you to take away from that statement, I think my phone is ringing” Carol pretended to look for her phone “it’s work probably, I have to leave now.” She hastily said as she gave you another kiss on the cheek and turning around to walk off fast.

“See you soon, pretty girl!” she yelled tuning her head over her shoulder, before disappearing behind a corner.

You stood still, smiling to yourself, happy that you could maker her nervous like she made you feel all the time. Your phone buzzed a few minutes later;

Seriously though, I had a great time and I can’t wait to see you again! - Carol 😉

——————————————————————–

It’s ehhh but maybe you like it @warlikebisexual

Carol would stop to ask more, smirk and look you deep in the eyes whenever she had the chance. Your heart would beat like a drum every time she would give you a teasing nickname or laugh at your terrible (but honestly quite good) jokes.

By the end of the coffee and cake you two were nearly buzzing in your seats, exited at how good things were going.

———————————————-

“I had a wonderful time” you said as you stepped out of the café. “ So did I, and I would love to repeat that again sometime…soon” Carol said turning to you. “Well you have my number, all you gotta do is text” you shyly smiled at her.

Of course Carol smirked but you could also make out a faint blush on her cheeks. “Oh I sure will, gorgeous!” said the chocolate eyed woman as she gave you a quick peck on the cheek. You looked down with a chuckle, shaking your head. Trying to hide the massive blush appearing in your face.

“Stop saying that you remind me of that creepy man,” you mumbled.              “But why would I stop? It’s true and I kinda have to thank him for being so dumb, he gave me the perfect reason to talk to you.” Carol said, tilting her head slightly.


“Oh so you had me on your mind before you talked to me? I thought this was more of an accident,” you teased her.
“Oh… now that is not what I wanted you to take away from that statement, I think my phone is ringing” Carol pretended to look for her phone “it’s work probably, I have to leave now.” She hastily said as she gave you another kiss on the cheek and turning around to walk off fast.

“See you soon, pretty girl!” she yelled tuning her head over her shoulder, before disappearing behind a corner.

You stood still, smiling to yourself, happy that you could maker her nervous like she made you feel all the time. Your phone buzzed a few minutes later;

Seriously though, I had a great time and I can’t wait to see you again! - Carol 😉

——————————————————————–

It’s ehhh but maybe you like it @warlikebisexual

Action movie screenwriter: you know what’s super happening and progressive we make the lady good and bad guys fight
Director:...

Action movie screenwriter: you know what’s super happening and progressive we make the lady good and bad guys fight

Director: yeah that sounds about right we can’t have a guy hit a lady bad guy that’s sexist

Screenwriter: this is a great idea we should make sure it happens in every movie

summary: Do consider: In an Avengers Secret Invasion movie that has Peter, Carol, T'Challa, Scott, Hope, Valkyrie (got overthrown by a...
question: Do consider: In an Avengers Secret Invasion movie that has Peter, Carol, T'Challa, Scott, Hope, Valkyrie (got overthrown by a Skrull impersonating her), Bucky, Sam, Genis-Vell (Bryan Dechart) and Rhodey, imagine Peter fights Veranke head on alone with Veranke not wanting to fight or kill a child with her telling him that he's alone while ripping off his iron spider legs and tells him to give up with Carol saying he's not alone and blasts her off. Cue Carol hugging Peter next.
answer: Ahh CAPTAIN MOM is my favorite trope!!! She’s the space lesbian mom that i never knew Peter needed !

title: Short hair, don’t care
body:
Carol Danvers x (gender neutral but intendet for fem (i guess)) Reader

Prompt: “ could you do an imagine where carol comes back from a long mission like, around 3 months, and when she comes back to reader, the reader had cut her hair short and is scared of what carol might say and ya know just cute fluff”

how the actual fuck do you give fics titles help thats sjsaljlkafjlhfhafha

Words: 725ish

Warnings: probably a lot of errors cause of my dyslexic ass and a lot of cheesy fluff. and the excessive use of the nickname baby… sorry

————————————————————————————–

You missed Carol badly, but why wouldn’t you. She’s been gone for nearly 3 moths now and communication was rare since it could compromise the mission.

So in between a few text per month you were left with your thoughts of her.
And as always when you were bored and alone your impulse control flew out of the window. After a few drinks and a lengthy discussion with Bucky you decided to cut your hair.

You felt amazing with your new look, it made your jaw and cheek bones pop out and you felt so badass that your sarcasm levels grew by a tenfold.

But now you started to feel a little anxious. Carol was going to return tonight and you hadn’t had the chance to tell her about the hair situation, since it’s not really on your priority list, when you are only allowed a few sentences per text.

It’s not like you thought Carol would hate you for it and would stop dating you but she always commented about how beautiful your hair flowed and she LOVED running her long fingers through it.
—— ———————- ————————————

Carol opened the door to your shared room, “hey baby, I’m back, I missed-” but before she could even finish her sentence she was tackled by you in a bone crushing hug.

“Oh my god finally, I was going insane without you, I missed you soo much” you mumbled in her neck as her strong arms held you securely.

Carol chuckled lightly “imagine how I felt all alone in space, I’m so exhausted all I wanna do is shower and cuddle you for the rest of the week.” She gently grabbed your face in her hands to look at you.

With you initial excitement you completely forgot about your hair, but now with her moving your head to gaze at you, your heart sped up and you bit your lip nervously, avoiding Carols chocolate eyes.

Carol however was at a loss of words as she took in your now short hair, with your eyes looking anywhere but her you didn’t see the absolute love radiating within them.

“… Baby wha- how, I mean when..” Carol was stuttering lightly a faint blush creeping on her cheeks, taken aback by how different but GOOD you looked.

You still weren’t looking at her and unsure about her stuttering, interpreting it as a sign of disliking. “ I cut it like a month ago, but its gonna grow out anytime soon anyways.. I mean if you don’t like it…” Your voice becoming quieter with every word.

“Hey no no no, baby please look at me,” Carol was fast to intervene. Slowly you met her eyes, finally looking directly at her after such a long time. Your heart beating faster for a completely different reason now.

“You look absolutely amazing, it really highlights your eyes and everything else about your stupidly beautiful face,” you giggled at her carol-like way to compliment you. “But you always said how much you liked my old hair…”

Insecurity got the best of you and even if you tend to be a bit of a sarcastic brat you mostly did it because you felt unsure about yourself from time to time.


“Oh baby I said that because I love everything about you, for all I know you could be wearing a Ronald McDonald wig and you’d still be the most beautiful person ever.” By now you were laughing both, still standing at the door, arms around each other.

You shook your head “you’re such a dork, I love you”, “and I love you… And your new hair, its so hot” carol gave you a suggestive look, you hit her shoulder lightly.
“Come on now, go shower so we can cuddle, you stink!” you were turning around to make yourself comfortable on the bed. “HEY!” Carol yelled in pretence offend and quickly spun you around to give you a deep kiss before pulling away to head to the bathroom.

“I’ll be quick, I can’t wait to scratch your head while we cuddle, it’ll be so easy now with your short hair. And I know how much you love it.” With those words and a quick loving smile she shut the door to the shower.

You smiled to yourself, god you loved her so much, and your new hair as well.

—————————————————————————–

Dayum that escalated haha I hope you liked it @semiipilots
